summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Greek office attendance calendar app. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend authentication has cookie-based login issues preventing full UI testing.

integration_issues.issue: Frontend cannot authenticate using session cookies, causing 401 errors and preventing dashboard access
integration_issues.details: API works with Bearer tokens and cookies via curl, but browser cookie authentication fails. Likely CORS/cookie domain/SameSite configuration issue.

passed_tests: Login page loads correctly with Greek text
Google login button present and clickable
Professional design with office background image

success_percentage.frontend: 30% (Login page works, but authentication flow blocked)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend cookie authentication issue. The backend APIs work perfectly with both Bearer tokens and cookies (tested with curl), but the React frontend cannot authenticate using session cookies. This appears to be a CORS/cookie configuration issue. Check: 1) Cookie domain/path settings in backend, 2) SameSite/Secure cookie attributes, 3) CORS configuration for credentials, 4) Frontend axios withCredentials settings.
